content.rendered:
🏆 Airdrop: CrowdSwap


💰 Value: 60,000$ CROWD


🎉1,000 LUCKY WINNERS


📅 End Date: 15th December 2021

 


🏦 Distribution Date: After TGE

 

🔐 All airdrop steps should be completed.

Talk with the Telegram BOT👈🏻



📖 Step-by-step guide:
💠 Join our Telegram group
💠 Follow our Twitter page + RT Giveaway!
💠 Submit your MATIC (or Metamask) Wallet address

.

📢 Notes:
💎 Total $CROWD Tokens: max 1,200,000
💎 Winners: 1000 random winners (from 50$ – 5000$)🌏
